color.code:
return context.item.data?.['title'] === "Dogs"
  ? "#61378D"
  : context.item.data?.['title'] === "Cats"
  ? "#FF6E06"
  : context.item.data?.['title'] === "Birds"
  ? "#F1D23E"
  : "#000000"; // default fallback

default.animationKeyframes: @keyframes fadeIn { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(20px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } }

children.code: return [{"icon":"lucide/house","color":"#61378D","title":"Adoption","description":"Find forever homes for strays"},{"icon":"lucide/search","color":"#F1D23E","title":"Lost & Found","description":"Reunite lost pets with owners"},{"icon":"lucide/heart-pulse","color":"#FF6E06","title":"Medical","description":"Emergency care and treatment"},{"icon":"lucide/shield","color":"#8561A8","title":"Rescue","description":"Save animals in distress"}]

return [{ "icon": "lucide/heart", "steps": ["Report case", "Share location", "Get assistance", "Track progress"], "title": "Medical Case Flow" }, { "icon": "lucide/house", "steps": ["Browse pets", "Submit application", "Home check", "Welcome home"], "title": "Adoption Flow" }, { "icon": "lucide/search", "steps": ["File report", "Share details", "Alert community", "Reunite"], "title": "Lost Pet Flow" }, { "icon": "lucide/triangle-alert", "steps": ["Report emergency", "First response", "Rescue action", "Recovery care"], "title": "Rescue Alert Flow" }]

default.animationKeyframes: @keyframes bounceIn { 0% { opacity: 0; transform: scale(0.3); } 50% { opacity: 1; transform: scale(1.05); } 70% { transform: scale(0.9); } 100% { transform: scale(1); } }

default.transition: transform 0.3s ease, background-color 0.3s ease, color 0.3s ease

interactions.name: Scroll to How It Works
interactions.description: Scrolls to the How It Works section

children.code: return [{"icon":"lucide/dog","title":"Dogs","description":"From playful puppies to gentle seniors, we help street dogs find loving homes and provide medical care when they need it most."},{"icon":"lucide/cat","title":"Cats","description":"Independent yet loving, we rescue stray cats, provide spay/neuter services, and connect them with caring families who understand their unique needs."},{"icon":"lucide/bird","title":"Birds","description":"From injured pigeons to lost parrots, our network helps rehabilitate birds and reunite them with nature or their human families."}]

default.animationKeyframes: @keyframes slideUp { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(20px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } }

children.code: return [{"icon":"lucide/users","title":"Community-Powered Care","description":"We believe in the power of collective compassion. Every rescue, adoption, and medical case is supported by our network of dedicated volunteers and animal lovers."},{"icon":"lucide/clock","title":"Timely Support","description":"Through real-time alerts and instant communication, we ensure that animals in distress receive help when they need it most - because every minute matters."},{"icon":"lucide/shield-check","title":"Safer Environment","description":"We're creating communities where animals and humans coexist safely, with proper care, vaccination programs, and awareness that benefits everyone."}]

children.code: return [{"title":"Post a Case","number":1,"description":"Create a detailed case for adoption, medical help, or rescue with photos and location."},{"title":"Volunteers Get Notified","number":2,"description":"Local volunteers and rescuers receive alerts based on proximity and expertise."},{"title":"Join Relevant Group Chat","number":3,"description":"Coordinate efforts in real-time through our dedicated chat groups."},{"title":"Get Help / Approve Adoptions","number":4,"description":"Receive assistance or review adoption applications through the app."},{"title":"Stay Connected","number":5,"description":"Follow up on cases, share success stories, and build a compassionate community."}]
